DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to investigate the effects of sleep improvement in leaders on leader outcomes.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Leader Sleep Improvement on Leadership
DOC.detailed_description: The investigators seek to extend the findings of a recent research which demonstrated that treating insomnia has several beneficial effects on employee work outcomes (Barnes, Miller, & Bostock, in press). In the present study, the investigators propose that the treatment of leader insomnia would beneficially influence leadership, specifically abusive supervision, charismatic leadership, and laissez-faire leadership.
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Working adults who have at least one direct report (i.e., subordinate). Exclusion criteria: Nonworking adults/ adults who do not have at least one direct report (i.e., subordinate).
